original_text: And those to camp next to him shall be the tribe of Asher, the chief of the people of Asher being Pagiel the son of Ochran,
korean_text: 그 곁에 진 칠 자는 아셀 지파라 아셀 자손의 지휘관은 오그란의 아들 바기엘이요

sentences.original_text: And those to camp next to him
shall be the tribe of Asher
the chief of the people of Asher
being Pagiel the son of Ochran
